Description: CUT YOUR TEETH ON THIS SEVEN STRING TONE MACHINE.... AT A GREAT PRICE!! This is a 2008 BLACK IBANEZ RG-7321 ELECTRIC GUITAR. It is in perfect structural condition. It is 100% original. It has light normal finish marks, dings, scuffs and scratches on the body. The back of the neck has one noticeable mark behind the 4th fret, but not deep or rough enough to be annoying. The guitar is complete except for the truss rod cover. This is a great, solid guitar, especially when you consider it is already 10 years old. Features include... black hardware, sealed tuners, five piece maple laminated Wizard profile neck, bound rosewood 24 fret fingerboard with dot markers, ebony gloss black finish body, matching black headstock with mirror logo, two Ibanez humbucker pickups, 5 way pickup selector switch, volume control, tone control, fixed bridge. Here is a rundown of the pickup selector switching... Position 1: neck series, 2: neck parallel, 3: both humbuckers, 4: both single coils (tapped), 5: bridge pickup. The truss rod works as it should; neck is straight (with proper, slight forward relief). All the electronics work as they should, no scratchy pots. The frets and finger board are in great shape. I have completely serviced the guitar... cleaned and polished the frets, cleaned and conditioned the fingerboard, cleaned and polished the body and neck, installed new strings (Ernie Ball, Super Slinky 9-52's), adjusted the bridge and intonation, etc. It is playing great and SOUNDS GREAT! DON'T MISS IT!! Buyer pays $29.95 shipping, insurance, packaging and handling to lower 48 states. Delivered to your door for less than $250. (What a DEAL!) Items over 2 lbs will ship Fed Ex ground, (no PO Boxes). Thanks for looking and good luck. The following is common sense stuff, but needs mentioned: -If you have a concern with any item purchased, CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY by phone or email. I always offer a full refund of the purchase amount. You should not have to live with something you are unhappy with for any reason. If you alter, modify, change or "repair" the item in anyway without my consent, you are accepting the item "as is", at the price paid. All items are packed for safety, possibly requiring reassembly, tuning and/or adjusting. -If you receive an item that has been damaged in shipping, CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY and save all the packaging. We will work through the claim together until things are right. -I can ship almost anywhere, but free shipping or a fixed shipping price is for the contiguous 48 states ONLY. If you have a foreign address, use an APO, live in Alaska, Puerto Rico, etc., message me for a shipping price BEFORE you buy. Due to the cost and risk of shipping I do not accept returns from outside the US. Once the package is delivered to the carrier, the foreign buyer is responsible for the item, including but not limited to taxes, fees, customs issues, delays, damage, lose, duty, etc.
Title: 2008 IBANEZ 7 STRING ELECTRIC GUITAR RG 7321 EBONY BLACK SERVICED CLEAN HARDTAIL
ConditionDescription: VERY GOOD CONDITION.  SOLID and GREAT SOUNDING GUITAR w/ normal light scuffs, scratches, bumps and dings.  CLEAN and SERVICED... READY TO PLAY!
